column4: (Karimganj) At District - Anipur NEC road to Kandigram-I road | Reported on 27/09/2022 by the Executive Engineer, PWRD, Patharkandi & Ratabari T. R. Divn., Ramkrishnanagar, that road from Anipur NEC to Kandigram-I was badly damaged by landslide due to rain water & flood water from 17-06-2022 to 24-06-2022. Approx. length = 1000m (from 0.00m to 1000m) | 0
